name: Tornado Doggy
description:
This game is a platformer type of game in which you control a dog with a sword who can only spin three times before being dizzy ! However his spinning ability allows him to double jump, bringing interesting platforming mechanics ! 🌪️🐶

Controls :

R key to restart.

Esc key to go back to the menu.

Arrow keys ←↓→↑ to move and jump.

Spacebar key to jump as well.
